segments.text: They must have got in through the kitchen window .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If only we'd remember to close it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am afraid your diamond bracelet has gone , darling !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish I'd put it in the bank .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: look ! they've taken your fur coat too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , I am sorry I ever bought it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I noticed they've taken our radio and left the television .
segments.speaker: S1
